channel.title: Comments on: Easing Back Into It, via 915 S. Grand View
channel.description: Blogging demolitions one building at a time.

item.title: By: Kim Cooper
item.dc:creator: Kim Cooper
item.description: It's great to have you back on the threatened building beat, Nathan. Too many of these fine places are falling to the completely discretionary TOC upzoning scam that enriches politicians and causes grave harm to the commons. The work you're doing is important. Your books are amazing, too!
item.content:encoded: It’s great to have you back on the threatened building beat, Nathan. Too many of these fine places are falling to the completely discretionary TOC upzoning scam that enriches politicians and causes grave harm to the commons. The work you’re doing is important. Your books are amazing, too!
